fig.title: Kirk Key Interlocks for Bypass Mode

body.p: Bypass Mode is entered by physically setting up the MCCBs and MCSWs to go to bypass. The STS has key-interlocked bypass MCCBs/MCSWs allowing logic to be disconnected from power sources without interrupting output load power (). Engaging the bypass and returning from bypass to STS normal mode both require the operator to manipulate Kirk Keys and MCCBs or MCSWs.
